kpi.name: M1008C218

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH SERVING CELL CHANGES FAILED DUE TO BTS
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH serving cell change failures due to BTS. UPDATED:When the RNC receives NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION FAILURE during serving HS-DSCH cell change or a timer waiting for NBAP: RADIO LINK RECONFIGURATION COMPLETE expires.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH SERVING CELL CHANGES FAILED DUE TO BTS
